amendment.description: Amendment requires that the cybersecurity strategic research and development plan include ways and means of how the United States can work with international partners to make technology infrastructure even safer.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 111-410 to include international cooperation where appropriate as part of the Cybersecurity Strategic Research and Development Plan.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Paulsen amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
